short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension enables you to open current tab in a small popup window.
short.ru: Это расширение позволяет открыть текущую вкладку в небольшом всплывающем окне.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension opens current tab in a small popup window without toolbar, address bar, status bar, and tabs, improving your experience of glancing through the web-content.
long.ru: This small extension opens current tab into a small Chrome window without toolbar, address bar, status bar and tabs, improving your experience of glancing through the web-content.
